description: The agent generate this trap when the
cam usage for a partition is exceeded.

event.Summary: Cam Storage limit exceeded for partition

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::camUsageThresholdExceed FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::sysCompAlarmLevel i 9999 FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::sysCompAlarmVarString s EXAMPLE FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::sysCompSlotId i 9999 FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::sysCompPortPipe i 9999 FORCE10-SYSTEM-COMPONENT-MIB::sysCompCamPartId s EXAMPLE

description: The agent generate this trap when the
cam is fully used.
